item.title: A digital sales training platform that enables users to engage in role-playing exercises
item.description: Role-playing is crucial for sales training, allowing two people to act out real-life sales scenarios. While businesses utilize meeting software for training remote sales teams, this technology often lacks features for practicing pitches online. uniRow’s TrainingCloud.com is designed specifically to facilitate online role-playing during sales training. Trainers can conduct, record, and share role-plays for evaluation and learning purposes. Nimit Kumar, CEO & Founder of uniRow, emphasizes the importance of hands-on practice in sales training.
